original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, process expertise, and technical proficiency. As a Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving business requirements within the vehicle configuration space. By leveraging your skills in data analysis, system configuration, and process improvement, you will drive the development and implementation of effective technical solutions that enhance efficiency and deliver tangible value to the organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to understand complex business processes, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying and data visualization
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to derive valuable insights from complex datasets

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, which will be crucial for interacting with the [mention specific system] backend
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts, which can be leveraged to develop innovative solutions

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in a configuration or business analysis role, with a proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Preferred Experience:
- Previous experience working in the vehicle configuration space, which will provide valuable context and domain knowledge
- Exposure to Agile project management tools and techniques, which will enhance your ability to collaborate effectively and drive project success

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] backend
- SQL, data analysis, and visualization tools
- Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment, with regular interaction with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities effectively
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies as the organization evolves
